me.ipodtouch0218.sjbotcore.handler

Class ReactionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.ipodtouch0218.sjbotcore.handler.ReactionHandler

  • public abstract class ReactionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A basic MessageReaction handler. Can be added to a MessageHandler to be passed control to handle reaction additions or removals. An owner can be specified to limit the function of the reaction handler to one particular user.

    • Method Detail

      • handleReaction

        public abstract void handleReaction(net.dv8tion.jda.core.events.message.react.GenericMessageReactionEvent e,
                                    boolean add,
                                    boolean isOwner)
        Abstract method to handle the addition or removal of a MessageReaction on a certain message.
        Parameters:
        e - - GenericMessageReactionEvent passed by the event handler.
        add - - If the given was added to the message. If not, the reaction was removed.
        isOwner - - If the getOwnerId() matches the user which added the reaction.

      • setOwnerId

        public void setOwnerId(long id)
        Sets the ownerID field, allows the reactionHandler method to limit function to only the user with the given id passed.
        Parameters:
        id - - Sets the ID of the owner.

      • getOwnerId

        public long getOwnerId()

      • clearUserReactions

        public void clearUserReactions(net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.User user,
                               net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.Message m)
        Removes MessageReactions from a given Message added by the given user.
        Parameters:
        user - - User to remove reactions by.
        m - - Message to remove reactions from.

      • clearAllReactions

        public static void clearAllReactions(net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.Message m)
        Removes all MessageReactions from a given message.
        Parameters:
        m - - Message instance to remove MessageReactions from.
        See Also:
        Message.clearReactions()

      • setReactions

        public static void setReactions(net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.Message m,
                                java.lang.String... options)
        Adds all MessageReactions specified to the given message. Useful for settings default options the user can choose, without having the user manually search and add the required reactions.
        Parameters:
        m - - Message instance to add reactions to.
        options - - Adds all given String reactions to the message.
